column4: soi just installed java6 jre using apt-get, but my JAVA_HOME environ var is not set automatically... where exactly is java installed to, or how do i find it? "locate java" just yields a bunch of crap
I am having lots of problems too with Java 6. Have u found a solution? I'd be interested to know
all i want to know is what the install path for java is.........
Sorry I cant help you then! Good luck.
